# Base 16 Themes
This is a port of the [Base 16 themes](https://github.com/chriskempson/base16-textmate) for TextMate/Sublime.

## The Themes

The original [Base 16 repository](https://github.com/chriskempson/base16) is maintained by [Chris Kempson](https://github.com/chriskempson). the list of themes included in this extension is the following.

| Theme                  | Dark  | Light | Finished          |
|:-----------------------|:-----:|:-----:|:-----------------:|
| 3024                   | x     | x     | x                 |
| Apathy                 | x     | x     | x                 |
| Ashes                  | x     | x     | x                 |
| Atelier Dune           | x     | x     |                   |
| Atelier Forest         | x     | x     |                   |
| Atelier Heath          | x     | x     |                   |
| Atelier Lakeside       | x     | x     |                   |
| Atelier Seaside        | x     | x     |                   |
| Bespin                 | x     | x     |                   |
| Brewer                 | x     | x     | x                 |
| Bright                 | x     | x     | x                 |
| Chalk                  | x     | x     |                   |
| Codeschool             | x     | x     | x                 |
| Colors                 | x     | x     |                   |
| Default                | x     | x     | x                 |
| Eighties               | x     | x     | x                 |
| Embers                 | x     | x     | x                 |
| Flat                   | x     | x     | x                 |
| Google                 | x     | x     | x                 |
| Grayscale              | x     | x     | x                 |
| Greenscreen            | x     | x     | x                 |
| Harmonic               | x     | x     | x                 |
| Isotope                | x     | x     | x                 |
| London Tube            | x     | x     |                   |
| Marrakesh              | x     | x     | x                 |
| Mocha                  | x     | x     | x                 |
| Monokai                | x     | x     | x                 |
| Ocean                  | x     | x     | x                 |
| Oceanic Next           | x     | x     | x                 |
| Paraiso                | x     | x     | x                 |
| Pop                    | x     | x     | x                 |
| Railscasts             | x     | x     | x                 |
| Shapeshifter           | x     | x     | x                 |
| Solarized              | x     | x     | x                 |
| Summerfruit            | x     | x     | x                 |
| Tomorrow               | x     | x     | x                 |
| Twilight               | x     | x     | x                 |
| Unikitty               | x     | x     | x                 |
| Woodland               | x     |       | x                 |

I will be adding more in time.
